maqras.text: And (even) if We show mercy to them and remove the harm with which they are afflicted, they would still persist blindly wandering on in their rebellion
And We had caught them in the punishment but (even then) they do not submit themselves to their Lord, and they do not humble themselves
until when We open on them the door of severe punishment, then they will be in despair therein. (R)
And He it is Who has produced for you the ears and the eyes and the hearts (but) the gratitude which you show is (comparatively) less
And He it is Who has multiplied (and spread) you in the earth and to Him you will be gathered
And He it is Who gives life and causes death and the alternation of the night and the day is due to Him. Will you not then understand
No ! they say the like of that which the ancients said
They say, "What! when we are dead and become (part of the) soil and bones, will we really be raised
We are promised this, we and our forefathers earlier, these are nothing but stories of the ancient
Say, "Whose is the earth and whoever is therein, if you know
They will say, "God's." Say, "Will you not then be mindful
Say, "Whose is the Fostering of the seven skies (higher levels) and the Lordship of the great throne (of the universe)
They will say, "God's." Say, "Will you not then guard (against evil)
Say, "Who is it in Whose hand is the control of everything and He protects and there is no (one who can) protect against Him, if you know
They will say, "(This is also in) God's (control)." Say, “Then how are you under the influence of magic?”
No ! We have brought to them the truth but they are certainly liars

God has not taken any son nor is there any (other) god with Him, (had there been two or more gods, then) in that case, each god would have taken away that which he had created and some would have dominated over others, glorified be God above that which they describe
Knower of the unseen and the seen and He is Highly Exalted above that which they associate as partners (with Him)
Say, "My Lord! if you show me that which they are promised
my Lord! then do not make me to be among the unjust people
And We are certainly able to show you that which We have promised them
Repel evil with that which is the best, We know best about that which they describe
And say, "My Lord! I seek Your protection from the suggestions of the devils
and I seek Your protection, my Lord! lest they be present with me
(Some people continue to do evil) until when death comes to one of them (then) he says. "My Lord! send me back
that I may set right in (the world, all wrongs) which I have left behind." By no means! It is (only) a sentence which he says. And behind them is a barrier till the day they are raised
Then when it will be blown into the trumpet (structure of the universe) then there will be no relationships between them on that day and (therefore) they will not (be able to) demand from one another
Then those whose weight (of good) is heavy, those are the successful persons
And those whose weight (of good) is light, those are the persons who (have put) themselves (in) loss, they will stay in hell
The fire will burn their faces, and (due to severe suffering), they will have therein, an expression of torture with their lips apart
Were not My signs read to you? But you used to deny them
They will say, "Our Lord! our misfortune prevailed over us and we became a misguided people
Our Lord ! take us out of this, if we again return (to evil) then we will certainly be unjust
He will say, "Go away into it and do not speak to Me
There was a party from among My servants who said: Our Lord ! we believe, so protectively forgive us and have mercy on us and you are the Best of those who are merciful
But you took them as a ridicule to the extent that they made you forget (even) My remembrance and you used to laugh at (some) of them
I have rewarded them this day because they were patient, they are certainly the achievers (of success)
He will say, "How long did you stay in the earth, counting in years
They will say, "We stayed for a day or part of a day but ask those who keep the account
He will say, "You did not stay but a little, had you but known
Did you then think that We created you without any purpose and that you will not be returned to Us
So Highly Exalted is God the Real King, there is no god except Him, Lord of the honoured throne (of the universe)

And he who prays to another (presumed) god along with God, having no proof with him of it (being a god), then (the responsibility of taking) his account (rests) only on God. The disbelievers will certainly not be successful
And say, "My Lord! protectively forgive and have mercy and You are the Best of those who are merciful
